contexts.context: ...triumphed over Dagoth Ur, the people wished to build a <mark>monument</mark> to the heroes of that war. Vivec thanked them, but...
...them, but said that it would be better to dedicate a <mark>monument</mark> not only to the glorious heroes, but to all people...
...of the indomitable will and power of ALMSIVI, and a <mark>monument</mark> to Dunmer pride in overcoming its enemies.
